doc:
Lon Poff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lon_Poff 0 Alonzo M. "Lon" Poff (February 8, 1870 – August 8, 1952) was an American film actor. He appeared in 98 films between 1917 and 1951. He was born in Bedford, Indiana, and died in Los Angeles, California. His grave is located in Glendale's Forest Lawn Memorial Park Cemetery. Alonzo_M._"_Lon_"_Poff ( February_8_,_1870 – August_8_,_1952 ) was an_American_film_actor . He appeared in 98_films between 1917_and_1951 . He was_born in Bedford , Indiana , and died in Los_Angeles , California . His_grave is located in Glendale 's_Forest_Lawn_Memorial_Park_Cemetery .
